code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import menuSlice from"./menu_slice";import spriteSlice from"./sprite-slice";import selectedSpriteSlice from"./selected_sprite_slice";import spriteStyleSlice from"./sprite_style_slice";var store=configureStore({reducer:{menu:menuSlice.reducer,sprite:spriteSlice.reducer,selectedStripe:selectedSpriteSlice.reducer,spriteStyle:spriteStyleSlice.reducer}});export default store;
